name: Squido
discription: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

name: Charmander
discription: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Bulbasaur
discription: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

name: Pikachu
discription: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.

name: Psyduck
discription: Psyduck is constantly beset by headaches. If the Pokémon lets its strange power erupt, apparently the pain subsides for a while.

name: Growlithe
discription: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
